caption.p:
Carbonyl value ( CV) of the sunflower oil as affected by the different concentrations of lemon verbena essential oil (0, 400, 800, and 1,600 ppm) during storage time. –♢–, Control; □ –■–, 400 ppm of lemon verbena essential oil; –▲–, 800 ppm of lemon verbena essential oil; ··×··, 1,600 ppm of lemon verbena essential oil; –
* –, BHT (200 ppm)
